content:
TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer Class

In this Article

Exposes TreeViewItem types containing data items to UI Automation.

Syntax

Declaration

public class TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer : System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • DispatcherObject
  • AutomationPeer
  • System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer
  • TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer

Constructors summary

TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer(Object,ItemsControlAutomationPeer,TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer)

Initializes a new instance of the TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer class.

Properties summary

ParentDataItemAutomationPeer

Gets the TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer that is the parent to this automation peer.

Methods summary

GetAutomationControlTypeCore()

Gets the control type for the TreeViewItem that is associated with this TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer. Called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*.
GetClassNameCore()

Gets the name of the TreeViewItem that is associated with this TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer. Called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*.
GetPattern(PatternInterface)

Gets the control pattern for the element that is associated with this TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer.

Explicit Interface Implementations summary

IExpandCollapseProvider.Collapse()

Hides all nodes, controls, or content that are descendants of the control.
IExpandCollapseProvider.Expand()

Displays all child nodes, controls, or content of the control.
IExpandCollapseProvider.ExpandCollapseState

Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control.
IScrollItemProvider.ScrollIntoView()

Scrolls the content area of a container object in order to display the control within the visible region (viewport) of the container.
ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection()

Adds the current element to the collection of selected items.
ISelectionItemProvider.IsSelected

Gets a value that indicates whether an item is selected.
ISelectionItemProvider.RemoveFromSelection()

Removes the current element from the collection of selected items.
ISelectionItemProvider.Select()

Clears any selection and then selects the current element.
ISelectionItemProvider.SelectionContainer

Gets the UI automation provider that implements ISelectionProvider and acts as the container for the calling object.

Constructors

  • TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer(Object,ItemsControlAutomationPeer,TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer)

    Initializes a new instance of the TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer class.

    public TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer (object item, System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer itemsControlAutomationPeer, System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer parentDataItemAutomationPeer);

    Parameters

    • item
      Object

      The data item in the stem.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items* collection that is associated with this TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer.

    • itemsControlAutomationPeer
      ItemsControlAutomationPeer

      The ItemsControlAutomationPeer that is associated with the ItemsControl that holds the stem.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items* collection.

    • parentDataItemAutomationPeer
      TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer

      The TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer that is the parent to this TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer.

Properties

  • ParentDataItemAutomationPeer

    Gets the TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer that is the parent to this automation peer.

    public System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer ParentDataItemAutomationPeer { get; }

    Property Value

    • TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer

      The parent automation peer.

Methods

  • GetAutomationControlTypeCore()

    Gets the control type for the TreeViewItem that is associated with this TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer. Called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*.

    protected override System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType GetAutomationControlTypeCore ();

    Returns

    • AutomationControlType

      AutomationControlType in all cases.

  • GetClassNameCore()

    Gets the name of the TreeViewItem that is associated with this TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer. Called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*.

    protected override string GetClassNameCore ();

    Returns

    • String

      A string containing the value TreeViewItem.

  • GetPattern(PatternInterface)

    Gets the control pattern for the element that is associated with this TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer.

    public override object GetPattern (System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface patternInterface);

    Parameters

    • patternInterface
      PatternInterface

      The type of pattern implemented by the element to retrieve.

    Returns

    • Object

      The object that implements the pattern interface, or null if the specified pattern interface is not implemented by this peer.

    Remarks

    The following table describes what the GetPattern method returns when depending on the value of patternInterface:

    The value of patternInterface The return value
    PatternInterface The current TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer.
    PatternInterface The TreeViewItemAutomationPeer that represents the TreeViewItem that contains the data item
    PatternInterface The current TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer.
    PatternInterface The current TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer.
    PatternInterface An object that implements the ISynchronizedInputProvider interface.

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • IExpandCollapseProvider.Collapse()

    Hides all nodes, controls, or content that are descendants of the control.

    void IExpandCollapseProvider.Collapse ();

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IExpandCollapseProvider interface.

  • IExpandCollapseProvider.Expand()

    Displays all child nodes, controls, or content of the control.

    void IExpandCollapseProvider.Expand ();

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IExpandCollapseProvider interface.

  • IExpandCollapseProvider.ExpandCollapseState

    Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control.

    System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider.ExpandCollapseState { get; }

    Returns

    • ExpandCollapseState

      The state, expanded or collapsed, of the control.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IExpandCollapseProvider interface.

  • IScrollItemProvider.ScrollIntoView()

    Scrolls the content area of a container object in order to display the control within the visible region (viewport) of the container.

    void IScrollItemProvider.ScrollIntoView ();

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IScrollItemProvider interface.

  • ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection()

    Adds the current element to the collection of selected items.

    void ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection ();

    Exceptions

    • ElementNotAvailableException

      UI Automation element is no longer available.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionItemProvider interface.

  • ISelectionItemProvider.IsSelected

    Gets a value that indicates whether an item is selected.

    bool System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.IsSelected { get; }

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if an item is selected; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionItemProvider interface.

  • ISelectionItemProvider.RemoveFromSelection()

    Removes the current element from the collection of selected items.

    void ISelectionItemProvider.RemoveFromSelection ();

    Exceptions

    • ElementNotAvailableException

      UI Automation element is no longer available.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionItemProvider interface.

  • ISelectionItemProvider.Select()

    Clears any selection and then selects the current element.

    void ISelectionItemProvider.Select ();

    Exceptions

    • ElementNotAvailableException

      UI Automation element is no longer available.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionItemProvider interface.

  • ISelectionItemProvider.SelectionContainer

    Gets the UI automation provider that implements ISelectionProvider and acts as the container for the calling object.

    System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.SelectionContainer { get; }

    Returns

    • IRawElementProviderSimple

      The UI automation provider.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionItemProvider interface.
